text: @kaitlancollins @JohnJHarwood @PressSec you are right @realDonaldTrump ‘s COVID19 response absolutely speaks for itself. It is the response of an incompetent corrupt unempathetic small handed scared authoritarian. We have heard the message loud and clear. #TrumpFailedAmerica #TrumpWorstPresidentEver
